articleData.blog_content: I would like to describe my journey from the start, the journey which inspired me, the journey which taught me the ethics and values of life.It was not an easy job for me to get into Desire Foundation and be an integral part of it, but now that I have spent almost a year,I feel like my second home.I got many opportunities to expose my social skills time and again.Experiencing new challenges,I became stronger and smarter.Conducting surveys,organizing events and working on projects were enjoyable and interesting which developed me as person as well as a professional .I didn't get that feel of boredom or joblessness which most of the time I experience in my life otherwise.The guidance I sought from my seniors specially our founder father and other fellow members are very valuable to me, sometimes we ourselves are not able to see that what we are capable to do, we need guidance .The working culture here is so friendly that I never felt aloof,always supporting each other,respecting others ideas and views and a great spirit of teamwork exists here.Through all this I have got to learn many new things and I really feel happy about it.I feel myself as a socially active person which is all due to Desire Foundation.
